Package com.boatcorp.boatgame.screens

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicMenuScreen
    A base class to use ensure consistency across menus.
    ModeScreen
    This screen allows the user to choose what difficulty the game is.
    PauseScreen
    This class creates a pause screen which the user can interact with to return to the game or quit.
    PlayScreen
    Contains all the functions necessary to run the game and displays it on the screen.
    ResultScreen
    This class gives the screen which displays weather the user has won or lost at the end of the game.
    SaveScreen
    This class contains the screen to get which save game state the user wants to pick.
    ShopScreen
    This class provides the screen of the text to inform the user of what can be purchased with their plunder.
    SplashScreen
    This class contains the methods to create a splash screen at the start of the game.
    StartMenuScreen
    This class is what the user uses to learn the controls, and pick if they want to start a game or look at past saved games.
